snippet: The composer Morton Subotnick was the headline act in the second “Source of Uncertainty” concert celebrating analog synthesis, part of the River to River Festival.
abstract: Allan Kozinn reviews performance by composer Morton Subotnick at the Schimmel Center for the Arts as part of the River to River Festival.
lead_paragraph: The composer Morton Subotnick was the headline act in the second “Source of Uncertainty” concert celebrating analog synthesis, part of the River to River Festival.

headline.seo: ‘Source of Uncertainty,’ Featuring Morton Subotnick, at Schimmel Center
headline.main: In Digital Era, a Throwback to Analog
headline.print_headline: In Digital Era, a Throwback to Analog
